nodes.text: A raccoon was a type of creature with a black mask across their eyes. In 3.5 ABY, when the Wookiee Chewbacca disguised himself as the bounty hunter Snoova as part of a plan to infiltrate Black Sun leader Prince Xizor's fortress, his disguise gave him a raccoonlike mark across his eyes.
Raccoons were first mentioned in Steve Perry's 1996 novel Shadows of the Empire. In the real world, raccoons are omnivorous furred mammals with bandit-like masks across their eyes.
